job_list.title: delivery.com
job_list.text: Last semester, I interned on the responsive team at dcom, and primarily worked within the AngularJS framework. I completed tasks in a sprint-based agile environment, utilizing tools such as JIRA and Github, working with designers, product managers, and senior devs to see tickets through to completion.

job_list.title: jawbone
job_list.text: Last summer, I worked on the web team at Jawbone, where I gained most of my full stack experience. I primarily became proficient using Python, JavaScript, and MySQL. My project was to develop UP Sims - a feature enabling developers to generate test users of varying metrics in order to assist the development of 3rd party apps.

job_list.title: grooveshark
job_list.text: After my sophomore year, I had the privilege of working on the Android team at Grooveshark. I implemented the Chromecast functionality of their mobile app along with other features. I also participated in a month long course covering front-end basics, server side programming, and version control in order to learn web development.
